Text.Page:
The Black Claws refuse to leave us in peace, so I want you to give them a messageâ€”in blood.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:41#4004#Black Claw berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:41#4005#slaughterers} and {@LinkCreature:41#3006#blood fighters} at the Arena of Blood and in southern Feral Valley. Collect their badges as proof of their deaths.

Take the badges to Jaebel at Experior Outpost.
Well done. Please take this token of gratitude from the federation.
We need you to eliminate the Black Claws at the Arena of Blood and in south Feral Valley.
